home.title: First Impression AI
home.subtitle: Discover your first impression with just one photo!
home.latestInsights: Latest Insights from Our AI Lab

aboutService.title: What is First Impression AI?
aboutService.paragraph: Have you ever wondered what vibe you give off? FirstLine uses advanced AI to analyze a single photo and tell you your first impression in one compelling line. Our service is designed for fun and self-discovery, helping you see yourself from a new, intriguing perspective. We believe in positive and uplifting interactions, so all our analyses are crafted to be encouraging and insightful. It's a great conversation starter and a new way to engage with your friends and followers.

step1.title: Choose Analysis Type
step1.description: Select whether you want to analyze your photo or a character's image.

step2.title: Upload Your Photo
step2.description: Click the upload button and select a clear, well-lit photo of yourself or a character.

step3.title: Get Your First Impression
step3.description: Our AI will analyze the image and instantly provide a one-line summary of your first impression. Share it with the world!

result.noImageUploaded: No image has been uploaded yet.
result.noImageUploadedDescription: To see your AI-generated first impression, please go back to the homepage and upload a photo.
result.celebrityDisclaimer: This result is for reference, showing images of a similar style based on the image's mood as searched by AI.
result.shareText: Check out my first impression analysis from First Impression AI!

about.title: About FirstLine: Unveiling Your Digital Persona
about.introduction: Welcome to FirstLine, where cutting-edge AI meets the fascinating world of first impressions. We believe that every image tells a story, and our mission is to help you discover and understand the unique narrative your photos convey.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: FirstLine was born from a simple yet profound curiosity: how do we perceive each other, and what hidden cues in our appearance shape those initial judgments? Leveraging advanced artificial intelligence, we set out to build a service that could distill these complex human perceptions into a single, insightful line.
ourStory.paragraph2: Our journey began with extensive research into visual psychology, social perception, and AI's capabilities in image analysis. We've meticulously trained our models to recognize subtle nuances in facial expressions, posture, and visual context to generate positive and engaging first impression analyses. We're a team of AI enthusiasts, developers, and designers passionate about creating tools that are both innovative and enjoyable.
ourStory.paragraph3: FirstLine is more than just an app; it's a playful exploration of identity and connection. We're dedicated to providing a unique experience that's always positive, thought-provoking, and a fantastic conversation starter. We continuously refine our algorithms and expand our understanding to bring you the most accurate and delightful insights.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.paragraph: Our mission at FirstLine is to empower individuals to explore their digital persona with confidence and curiosity. We aim to provide a lighthearted yet insightful tool that fosters self-awareness and sparks meaningful interactions. We envision a world where understanding our first impressions becomes a fun and accessible journey for everyone.

howItWorks.title: How Our AI Works
howItWorks.paragraph: Our proprietary AI models analyze various visual elements in your uploaded photo. This includes (but is not limited to) facial symmetry, expression, perceived mood, and general aesthetic. The AI then synthesizes these observations to generate a concise, positive, and unique first impression phrase, along with a brief explanation. Rest assured, your photos are processed with utmost privacy and are never stored after analysis.

joinUs.title: Join the FirstLine Community
joinUs.paragraph: Become part of a growing community curious about self-discovery and digital identity. Share your insights, engage with friends, and uncover new facets of your online presence. We're constantly evolving, and your feedback helps us make FirstLine even better!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how FirstLine ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your information when you use our website and services (collectively, the "Service"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data in an open and transparent manner. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

photos.title: 1.1 Photos for AI Analysis
photos.paragraph: When you use our AI analysis feature, you may upload photos. These photos are processed temporarily and solely for the purpose of generating your first impression analysis. We do NOT store your photos on our servers after the analysis is complete. All uploaded photo data is immediately discarded.

usageData.title: 1.2 Usage Data
usageData.paragraph1: We may collect information on how the Service is accessed and used ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g., IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data.
usageData.paragraph2: We use Google Analytics to help us understand how our users engage with the Service. Google Analytics collects information anonymously. It reports website trends without identifying individual visitors. You can opt-out of Google Analytics without affecting how you visit our site â€“ for more information on opting out of Google Analytics across all websites you use, visit this Google page: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

cookies.title: 1.3 Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.paragraph1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Other tracking technologies also used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service.
cookies.paragraph2: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
cookies.paragraph3: For advertising purposes, third-party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to your website or other websites. Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to your users based on their visit to your sites and/or other sites on the Internet. Users may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings. (Alternatively, you can direct users to opt out of a third-party vendor's use of cookies for personalized advertising by visiting www.aboutads.info/choices/).

dataUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
dataUse.paragraph: We use the collected data for various purposes:
dataUse.list1: To provide and maintain the Service
dataUse.list2: To notify you about changes to our Service
dataUse.list3: To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so
dataUse.list5: To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our Service
dataUse.list6: To monitor the usage of our Service
dataUse.list7: To detect, prevent and address technical issues
dataUse.list8: To deliver personalized advertisements relevant to your interests.

dataSharing.title: 3. Disclosure of Your Data
dataSharing.photos: Your uploaded photo data is NOT shared with any third parties. It is processed temporarily for analysis and immediately discarded.
dataSharing.serviceProviders: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ("Service Providers"), to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used. These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
dataSharing.legalRequirements: FirstLine may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:
dataSharing.legalList1: To comply with a legal obligation
dataSharing.legalList2: To protect and defend the rights or property of FirstLine
dataSharing.legalList3: To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
dataSharing.legalList4: To protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public

dataSecurity.title: 4. Security of Data
dataSecurity.paragraph: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Data Protection Rights under GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation)
yourRights.paragraph1: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights. FirstLine aims to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Data.
yourRights.paragraph2: If you wish to be informed what Personal Data we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please contact us.
yourRights.paragraph3: In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights:
yourRights.list1: The right to access, update or to delete the information we have on you.

childrenPrivacy.title: 6. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.paragraph: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 7. Links to Other Sites
thirdPartyLinks.paragraph: Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third-party sites or services.

policyChanges.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.paragraph: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "effective date" at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.paragraph: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to FirstLine! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the FirstLine website, services, and applications (collectively, the "Service"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Service.

serviceDescription.title: 1. Service Description
serviceDescription.paragraph: FirstLine provides an AI-powered photo analysis service that generates a single-line first impression comment based on uploaded images. Our Service is intended for entertainment purposes only. The results are not to be taken as professional advice, diagnosis, or any form of factual statement about an individual. You acknowledge and agree that all results are for fun and self-exploration.

userAccounts.title: 2. User Accounts
userAccounts.paragraph: Currently, FirstLine does not require user accounts. You can access and use most features of the Service without registration. Should we introduce account features in the future, separate terms regarding account creation, security, and termination will be provided.

userConduct.title: 3. User Conduct
userConduct.paragraph1: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the Service. Prohibited behavior includes harassing or causing distress or inconvenience to any person, transmitting obscene or offensive content, or disrupting the normal flow of dialogue within the Service.
userConduct.list1: Upload any images that are illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, defamatory, obscene, hateful, racially or ethnically objectionable, or otherwise inappropriate.
userConduct.list2: Upload images that infringe upon any intellectual property rights, privacy rights, or publicity rights of any third party.
userConduct.list3: Use the Service for any commercial purposes without our express written consent.
userConduct.list4: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion or feature of the Service, or any other systems or networks connected to the Service.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph: The Service and its original content (excluding content provided by users), features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of FirstLine and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the [Your Country] and foreign countries. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of FirstLine.

userContent.title: 5. User-Generated Content (Uploaded Photos)
userContent.paragraph1: You retain all rights to any photos you upload to the Service. By uploading a photo, you grant FirstLine a temporary, non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, reproduce, process, and display that photo solely for the purpose of providing the AI analysis and presenting the result to you. As stated in our Privacy Policy, uploaded photos are NOT stored on our servers after analysis and are immediately discarded.
userContent.paragraph2: You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary licenses, rights, consents, and permissions to upload the photos you submit to the Service and to grant the license described herein.

disclaimerOfWarranties.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimerOfWarranties.paragraph: Your use of the Service is at your sole risk. The Service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis. The Service is provided without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement or course of performance.

limitationOfLiability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.paragraph: In no event shall FirstLine, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the Service; (iii) any content obtained from the Service; and (iv) unauthorized access, use or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence) or any other legal theory, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damage, and even if a remedy set forth herein is found to have failed of its essential purpose.

indemnification.title: 8. Indemnification
indemnification.paragraph: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless FirstLine and its licensee and licensors, and their employees, contractors, agents, officers and directors, from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees), resulting from or arising out of a) your use and access of the Service, by you or any person using your account and password; b) a breach of these Terms, or c) Content posted on the Service.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.paragraph: We may terminate or suspend your access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. All provisions of the Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.

governingLaw.title: 10. Governing Law
governingLaw.paragraph: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changesToTerms.title: 11. Changes to These Terms
changesToTerms.paragraph: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, please stop using the Service.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.paragraph: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

help.title: Help Center & Frequently Asked Questions
help.introduction: Welcome to the FirstLine Help Center. Here you'll find answers to common questions, tips for using our service, and resources to understand the fascinating world of AI-powered first impressions. If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to reach out!

q1.question: What is FirstLine?
q1.answer: FirstLine is an AI-powered web service that analyzes your uploaded photo to generate a single-line 'first impression' comment. It's designed for fun, self-discovery, and to spark conversation.

q2.question: Is FirstLine's analysis scientific or definitive?
q2.answer: No, FirstLine's analysis is for entertainment purposes only. It uses AI to interpret visual cues, but it is not scientific, diagnostic, or a definitive statement about an individual. Results should be taken with a lighthearted perspective.

q3.question: What kind of photos work best?
q3.answer: For the most engaging results, upload clear, well-lit photos where your face (or the character's face) is clearly visible and facing forward. Good lighting and a neutral background often yield interesting impressions.

q4.question: Can I analyze photos of anyone?
q4.answer: We encourage analyzing your own photos or images of characters/celebrities that you have the right to use. Please respect privacy and intellectual property rights. Do not upload images of others without their consent or images that are inappropriate or offensive.

q1.question: Are my photos stored?
q1.answer: Absolutely not. Your uploaded photos are processed temporarily for AI analysis and are immediately discarded from our servers once the analysis is complete. We do not store any photo data.

q2.question: Is my data shared with third parties?
q2.answer: Your uploaded photo data is never shared with third parties. Anonymous usage data may be collected for service improvement and analytics (e.g., via Google Analytics) in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Please review our full Privacy Policy for more details.

q1.question: I'm having trouble uploading a photo. What should I do?
q1.answer: Ensure your image file is in a common format (like JPG, PNG) and not excessively large. Check your internet connection. If the problem persists, try a different browser or device.

q2.question: The result doesn't make sense or seems inaccurate.
q2.answer: Remember, the analysis is for entertainment. AI interpretations can sometimes be surprising! Try uploading a different photo with a clearer expression or different lighting. Our AI is constantly learning, but it's not perfect.

help.contactSupport: Still have questions? Feel free to reach out to our support team directly. We're here to help!
